content:
As of 7:00 on March 31, 2024, no ships in the Black and Azov seas are absent.

This is stated inmessageNavy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine.

At the same time in the Mediterranean there is 1 enemy ship - the carrier of the winged rockets "Caliber", a total volley of up to 8 rockets.

During the day in the interests of the Russian Federation the passage of the Kerch Strait was made:

11 vessels to the Azov Sea, 6 of them moved from the Bosphorus Strait;

To the Black Sea - 17 ships, 10 of them continued the movement in the direction of the Bosphorus.

The Russian Federation continues to violate the International Convention on the Protection of Human Life at the Sea of 1974 (SOLAS), switching off automatic identification systems (AIS).

As reported by the Armyinform, as of March 29, 2024 in the Black Seawas stayingenemy rocket carrier.
title: In the Black and Azov seas, the sales of the occupiers are absent - the Navy of the Armed Forces
description: This is stated in the report of the Navy of the Armed Forces of Ukraine. At the same time in ...
author: Army Inform
